snippet: Facebook has closed its acquisition of Instagram, The New York Times Bits blog reports. When the deal was announced, it was worth $1 billion, but at Facebook's midday trading price on Thursday of $18.97 a share, the deal would be worth $736 million.
abstract: Facebook has closed its acquisition of Instagram, The New York Times Bits blog reports. When the deal was announced, it was worth $1 billion, but at Facebook's midday trading price on Thursday of $18.97 a share, the deal would be worth $736 million.
